::Magmatron::

    He couldn't reply to any messages, as he was 'out of bod=
y'. But the ship's computer, which has part of Magmatron's mind in it, sent=
 a message to Bobertron and Pantron. Because they were Destron.
    "Come t=
o the base," It said in a monotone female voice.
  ----- Original Message -=
---- 
  From: kinger01030@... 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday,=
 December 01, 2000 3:28 PM
  Subject: Bobertron and pantron. -mess to cf an=
d destron


  Bobertron walked around. Pantron closley by his side. They wh=
ere quite a 
  team. Yes they where. But know they had to make a choice. Th=
ey looked to the 
  left to the maximal bases direction. They then turned t=
o the right towards 
  the destron base. They where torn between old bielef=
s and new recreations. 
  They each sent a comm to either base. Who ever re=
plied fort they decided 
  would be their new home. The message just stated=
 that they where two bots and 
  that they where searching for a new group.=
(one to the cf and one to the 
  magmatron's base.)

        eGroups Sponso=
r
